This strategy allows me to gauge Bob's interest and leaves room for negotiation. If Bob rejects, I can lower the price slightly in subsequent rounds. However, I also have the option to sell to John for $1,000,000 if the negotiations with Bob don't lead to a satisfactory outcome.
